description: Document for the end of a run indicating the success/fail state of the run and the end time

exit_status.description: State of the run when it ended

num_events.description: Number of Events per named stream

reason.description: Long-form description of why the run ended

run_start.description: Reference back to the run_start document that this document is paired with.

time.description: The time the run ended. Unix epoch

uid.description: Globally unique ID for this document
